Sentencas: The Danish energy system will continue to evolve in the years ahead as the goal is to be independent of fossil fuels by 2050.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: This introduces several challenges in dealing with intermittent energy sources, such as wind and solar.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: A novel biomass-based polygeneration system concept is proposed, which can offer certain solutions to these challenges.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: The main concept is storing electricity by producing bio-SNG from syngas generated by biomass gasification and electrolytic hydrogen when electricity prices are low, and producing electricity when prices are high.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: The analytical framework is built on thermodynamic modeling, and techno-economic analysis is applied to determine the total revenues required and net present value, given a range of bio-SNG and electricity prices.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: The marginal cost of operation is then used to estimate the average operation time in each production mode.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that both electricity (46%) and bio-SNG (69%) production efficiencies are high.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: If district heating is coproduced, the total efficiencies increase to 85% and 90%, respectively.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: Furthermore, it was found that the annual operation time in each mode varies significantly depending on the future electricity price scenario and bio-SNG price.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: A system that can select the production or consumption of electricity depending on the market price enables constant operation all year round.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: This results in a higher net present value for the system and may lead to a positive return on investment, given the appropriate market price of electricity and bio-SNG.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: However, the techno-economic analysis revealed that the district heating product may be important for the economic feasibility of the polygeneration plant.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power

Sentencas: This system may offer solutions in a smart energy system connecting electrofuel, heat, and power production, toward a 100% renewable system.
Titulo: Solution for the future smart energy system: A polygeneration plant based on reversible solid oxide cells and biomass gasification producing either electrofuel or power
